raw_comment:
1. I notice that nuclear is generating the most electricity . I also notice that coal generate electricity 
2. I wonder how coal generate electricity? 
3. this relates to my community because we use the electricity to do a lot of things like watch TV or use our phones. 
4. NUCLEAR ON TOP!!!
ace_sentences: I notice that nuclear energy generates the most electricity.
I notice that coal generates electricity.
I wonder how coal generates electricity.
We use electricity in my community.
We watch TV in my community.
We use phones in my community.
